name: MahaShakti
description:
As a Superhero, you PUNCH away at the Asur army before they overwhelm you and take down the city!

Download my game and Use Sidequest to install the game to your Oculus Quest!

-----8<-----8<-----8<-----8<-----8<-----8<-----8<-----8<-----

In what way does your game fit the theme?
The theme is about Stronger Together. In my game, the enemies are Stronger Together and if they outnumber the Players then it is a game over!

Did you write all the code yourself and made all the assets from scratch?
Coding: yes
Art: Not all of it (I also edited some models which I downloaded and combined them)
